channel.title: 508 HD Client Map Loading Problem
channel.description:
I used to use Moparscape a lot a year or too ago, but since then, 508 HD clients servers came out so I chose to give it a try.. I have a server and client, both running, but I hit a roadblock.. I don't know if this issue has been addressed before (if it has, please show me the post or tutorial), but when I attempt to, for example, teleport to a certain location on tutorial island, the game crashes with a runtime error/array-overload error. To make sure the map was loadable, I ran from Edgeville to Draynor with no crashes whatsoever, but the second I attempted to go below a certain y-coordinate (approximately 3100 or thereabouts), the game crashed. I believe it is the client or the cache, but I am not 100% sure.
I am not looking for an easy way out of this - if the problem is being worked on by a development team, I'd love to help.
Thanks,
Realm of Darkness - Owner
Note: I have this same post in the Server Help forum, but I haven't received any responses yet, so I wanted to try here as well.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2009, 08:41:00 am[/size][hr]List of Locations that Don't Work:
-Going too far west on karamja (towards Brimhaven from the F2P Docks) -Below a certain point on tutorial island (I can teleport to the northern tip of the island (around the bank), but no lower)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2009, 09:04:08 am[/size][hr]Here's the error message I get when I use Josh's HD 508 Client IP Changer and Mithscape V.1:
[code]Error: nc.G(-28009,{...}) T3 - true,285,3317,1092878019,-486422900,1044360789,-1186152368 bc.N(-107,285,{...}) bc.K(-23245,0,{...},285) ma.D(true) client.K(true) pb.HA(113) : Class7_Sub3_Sub1:144 Class9:445 Class9:242 Class14_Sub2_Sub13:125 client:1706 Applet_Sub1:765 Applet_Sub1:477 java.lang.Thread.run : java.lang.RuntimeException
error_game_crash
Shutdown complete - clean:true[/code]

item.title: 508 HD Client Map Loading Problem
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

I used to use Moparscape a lot a year or too ago, but since then, 508 HD clients servers came out so I chose to give it a try… I have a server and client, both running, but I hit a roadblock… I don’t know if this issue has been addressed before (if it has, please show me the post or tutorial), but when I attempt to, for example, teleport to a certain location on tutorial island, the game crashes with a runtime error/array-overload error.
To make sure the map was loadable, I ran from Edgeville to Draynor with no crashes whatsoever, but the second I attempted to go below a certain y-coordinate (approximately 3100 or thereabouts), the game crashed. I believe it is the client or the cache, but I am not 100% sure.

I am not looking for an easy way out of this - if the problem is being worked on by a development team, I’d love to help.

Thanks,

Realm of Darkness - Owner
